0.89.text:
The Adventure Media BA (Hons) degree at the
University of Cumbria is a one of a kind in

7.42.text:
Its unique location offers easy access to
the Lakes in the south, the coast line to

11.70.text:
the west and Scotland to the north and the
Pennines to the east.

15.93.text:
The resources available at the courses based
in Carlisle include editing suites, an AV

20.30.text:
department and some of the latest in high-specification
equipment available to students, along with

26.47.text: a dedicated staff team of lecturers and technicians.

30.61.text:
As Adventure Media students, there's also
unparalleled access to the resources of staff

34.87.text:
and equipment at our Ambleside campus, which
also provides an exciting stepping off point

39.78.text: to the rest of the Lake District.

42.30.text:
An important focus of the degree is the development
of team work and communication skills.

47.45.text:
Working in the Adventure Media industry requires
strong people skills and the ability to work

51.77.text: as a member of a team.

55.16.text:
The practical elements can develop a student's
confidence, give them the ability to not only

59.73.text:
develop their own skills, but also to be self
aware of their own development needs and have

64.33.text: a high level of risk competence.

68.81.text:
Although the course has two exciting strands
of adventure and media, it is worth emphasising

75.54.text:
The amount of time dedicated to study and
research should not be overlooked when considering

80.17.text: the more glamorous aspects of the course.

84.81.text:
Some of the graduates and current students
of the course have achieved not only commercial

88.21.text:
success, but have achieved recognition within
the Adventure Film Committee.
